description:
## Products and Services

Depending on the nature of your business, you might be selling products or services to your clients or even both. 
ERPNext is optimized for productized management of your sales and purchase.

The **Product Master**  is where you can add all your sales products. If you are in services, you can create an Product for each service that you offer. If you run a manufacturing business, the same master is used for keeping a record of raw materials, sub-assemblies etc.

Completing the Product Master is very essential for the successful implementation of ERPNext. We have a brief video introducing the product master for you, you can watch it in the next step.
name: Create a Product
title: Create a Sales Product
